text: Liu Fusheng (; born October 1931) is a People's Republic of China politician. He was born in Dingxiang County, Shanxi. He joined the Communist Party of China in 1947. He was People's Congress Chairman and CPPCC Chairman of Hunan.List of members of the People's Congress, China After The Ninth National People's Congress: Meeting Cross-century Challenges, 1998 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Shanxi Category:Communist Party of China politicians from Shanxi Category:Vice-governors of Hunan Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Xinzhou
title: Liu Fusheng
